text: Cecilie Uttrup Ludwig (born 23 August 1995) is a Danish professional road cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's WorldTeam . As a junior, she competed at the 2012 UCI Road World Championships and the 2013 UCI Road World Championships. ==Major results== ;2012 :UCI Junior Road World Championships ::2nd 15px Time Trial ::8th Road Race :7th Road Race, National Road Championships ;2014 :10th Road Race, National Road Championships ;2016 :1st 20px National Time Trial Championships :1st 20px Overall Tour de Feminin-O cenu Českého Švýcarska ::1st Stages 1 & 5 :1st 20px Mountains classification Ladies Tour of Norway :1st 20px Mountains classification Gracia Orlova :5th KZN Summer Series Race 2 :7th 94.7 Cycle Challenge :9th Road Race, UEC European Cycling Championships :9th Gooik-Geraardsbergen-Gooik :10th Boels Rental Hills Classic ;2017 :National Road Championships ::1st 20px Time Trial ::10th Road Race :1st 20px Youth classification UCI Women's World Tour :1st 20px Overall Setmana Ciclista Valenciana ::1st 20px Young rider classification :1st 20px Young rider classification Giro Rosa :2nd Overall Giro della Toscana Int. Femminile – Memorial Michela Fanini ::1st 20px Young rider classification :2nd Time Trial, UEC U23 European Cycling Championships :2nd Crescent Vårgårda TTT :UCI Road World Championships ::3rd Team Time Trial ::10th Time Trial :3rd Trofeo Alfredo Binda-Comune di Cittiglio :3rd La Classique Morbihan :5th Grand Prix de Plumelec-Morbihan Dames :7th Overall Emakumeen XXX. Bira :8th Overall The Women's Tour :9th Strade Bianche :10th Liège–Bastogne–Liège Femmes ;2018 :National Road Championships ::1st 20px National Time Trial Championships ::7th Road Race :3rd Crescent Vårgårda TTT :3rd Ladies Tour of Norway - TTT :3rd Giro dell'Emilia Internazionale Donne Elite :4th Overall Setmana Ciclista Valenciana :4th La Course by Le Tour de France :4th Chrono des Nations :6th Overall Giro Rosa :7th Trofeo Alfredo Binda - Comune di Cittiglio :10th Strade Bianche ;2019 :1st Grand Prix de Plumelec-Morbihan Dames :1st 20px Mountains classification Women's Tour of Scotland :3rd Trofeo Alfredo Binda :3rd Tour of Flanders :3rd La Course by Le Tour de France :4th Overall Tour de Bretagne Féminin :5th Strade Bianche :6th Amstel Gold Race Ladies Edition :8th La Flèche Wallonne Féminine :10th Overall Setmana Ciclista Valenciana :10th Liège-Bastogne-Liège Femmes ;2020 :1st Giro dell’Emilia Internazionale Donne Elite :2nd Flèche Wallonne :3rd Road Race, National Road Championships :4th Overall Giro Rosa ::1st 20px Mountains classification :7th Strade Bianche :8th Road Race, UCI Road World Championships ===Results timelines=== {| class="wikitable" |colspan=15 align=center| Grand Tour results timeline |- style="background:#EEEEEE;" !
